description: Manage the repository permissions accross multiple connected registries. Please see https://aka.ms/acr/connected-registry for more information.

commands.name: az acr connected-registry permissions show
commands.summary: Show the connected registry sync scope map information.
examples: az acr connected-registry permissions show -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry

commands.name: az acr connected-registry permissions update
commands.summary: Add and remove repository permissions accross all the necessary connected registry sync scope maps.
examples: az acr connected-registry permissions update -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --add repo1 repo2
az acr connected-registry permissions update -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --remove repo1 repo2
az acr connected-registry permissions update -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --remove repo1 --add repo2
